miniHistorias.descricao:
você vê um pergaminho flutuando entre duas rochas.
[1] Você ignora e continua sua viagem
Taking off his cap, he placed it over the muzzle of his rifle. Then he pushed the rifle slowly upward over the parapet, until the cap was visible from the opposite side of the street.

miniHistoriaEscolhaOposta.descricao: The honest man could contain himself no longer. He caught his daughter and her child in his arms.

miniHistorias.resultadoEscolha: Você achou uma poção de vida
